thread.title: Mike Trout made his buddy wear a full Eagles uniform to the gym after losing bet
thread.title_full: Mike Trout made his buddy wear a full Eagles uniform to the gym after losing bet

title: Mike Trout made his buddy wear a full Eagles uniform to the gym after losing bet
text:
Mike Trout made his buddy wear a full Eagles uniform to the gym after losing bet Getty Images Jan 18, 2017 at 4:53p ET 0Shares 
It’s no secret that MLB superstar Mike Trout is a diehard Philadelphia Eagles fan. The New Jersey native has gone to great lengths to show off his passion for his favorite NFL team , and now he’s bringing his friends along for the ride — whether they like it or not. 
Trout made a friendly wager with one of his hometown buddies on the outcome of Sunday’s Cowboys-Packers game. Trout took the Packers, while his friend, DJ Cottrell, took the Cowboys. 
So naturally, when the Cowboys suffered the devastating loss to the Packers, Cotrell was crushed — for more reasons than one. 
On Monday, Trout’s buddy had to pay up — by sporting a complete Philadelphia Eagles uniform to the gym. When Dallas let's you down. Gotta wear eagles uniform the entire workout. #FlyEaglesFly @MikeTrout pic.twitter.com/awgVMuTL8D 
— DJ Cottrell (@_CottrellDJ) January 18, 2017 
And it doesn’t sound like he’ll be allowed to take it off anytime soon. The fact I have to wear an entire Eagles uniform to the gym for a week is going to be the death of me.
